Late Night Talks.description: Get to knwo each other - for real.
questions: What's the best movie you've seen this year?
Which fictional character would you want as your best friend?
What's a TV show you can watch over and over again?

For Best Friends.description: How well do you really know them?
questions: What sport would you compete in if you were in the Olympics?

For Siblings.description: Ask each other before it's too late.

Couple Questions.description: Questions that will leave you feeling closer.
questions: What's something you've never told anyone?

What part of your life needs more attention right now?

For Soulmates.description: Get real, vulnerable and - deepen your love.
questions: Do you believe in fate or do we create our own destiny?

questions: What gives your life meaning?

For Long-Distance.description: Warning: this will make it difficult to hang up.
questions: Is it ever okay to lie?

What's your strongest held belief?
